mapper.update: UPDATE es_distribution distribution SET can_rebate = can_rebate + IFNULL(( SELECT ( IFNULL( ( SELECT sum(disorder.grade1_rebate) FROM es_distribution_order disorder WHERE member_id_lv1 = distribution.member_id AND disorder.is_withdraw = 0 and disorder.settle_cycle < #{currentData} ), 0 )+ IFNULL( ( SELECT sum(disorder.grade2_rebate) FROM es_distribution_order disorder WHERE member_id_lv2 = distribution.member_id AND disorder.is_withdraw = 0 and disorder.settle_cycle < #{currentData} ), 0 ) ) ), 0 ) ,commission_frozen = commission_frozen-IFNULL(( SELECT ( IFNULL( ( SELECT sum(disorder.grade1_rebate) FROM es_distribution_order disorder WHERE member_id_lv1 = distribution.member_id AND disorder.is_withdraw = 0 and disorder.settle_cycle < #{currentData} ), 0 )+ IFNULL( ( SELECT sum(disorder.grade2_rebate) FROM es_distribution_order disorder WHERE member_id_lv2 = distribution.member_id AND disorder.is_withdraw = 0 and disorder.settle_cycle < #{currentData} ), 0 ) ) ), 0 )
